Describe your issue: Hi, on 15 Jan 2021. I got a massage telling that I make a purchase on Canva but I did not do any purchase and the transaction happen without get any permission from me. I just notice about it few days ago and didn't know how to contact your team. i check my account bank and it said that I'm purchasing PreAuth Sale Canva. But I didn't what the hell is that and then on 16 January 2021 you give me a refund and suddenly the transaction happen again. I didn't know what is going on. How can you suddenly take my money, refund back and take again without telling and give me the detailing like what kind of image/design did I purchase
Describe the problem: I did not make any purchase and charged 34.90 What was the problem you had ?: Canva Pro
